name: Kissin' Fishes
description:
Kiss other fish! Do not kiss the sun. Snails are good kissers. There is also a duck. Best kisser wins!

One button for dash, another button for going blub blub blub.

Local multiplayer for 1-4 players. Probably works best with controllers, but you can all use the same keyboard too if you want. 

Gameplay and music by me. 

The art assets are from Brysia (https://brysiaa.itch.io/) and Kenney (https://kenney.nl/). 

The music is available to stream or download at https://soundcloud.com/c_bushmaker.
